name: Ragster - Reverse Runner Game
description:
Download in Google PlayStore NOW!   https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JValeskaGames.Ragsterhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.JValeskaGames.Ragster

Ragster is a 2020 new endless runner game for granny and for kids with new SPECIAL FEATURES like the possibility of manage game speed collecting turtles and the REVERSAL OF MOVEMENT CONTROL AXIS when the ground changes color which causes your brain short circuit and explode.
Can you accept this BRAIN CHALLENGE? How far you can go without burning your brain?

Easy, Free, & Fun Runner Game for Girls and Boys. Just Download and Enjoy. Ragster Reverse Runner the most addictive runner game in 2020.

Slide the finger in the direction you want to move: LEFT, RIGHT, JUMP or CRAWL and remember that  when ground changes color,
 LEFT will be RIGHT, RIGHT will be LEFT, JUMP will be CRAWL, and vice versa.

In other hand has similar properties like others endless jump and run games as try to collect coins,
 dodge lasers obstacles and other, jump blocks, escape from bombs and run endless as far as you can .

Download for free and play offline the best endless runner game in 2020. Choose your favourite hero runner from SIX characters.(No additional costs and no purchases integrated in application. 100% FREE)

In Ragster reverse runner game you can play offline while you have diamonds (lifes),
 accumulate all the diamonds you can by collecting coins and spinning the roulette.

All this features in less than 100 mb:

-Run as far as you can in this Endless Runner Game.
-Collect Coins and Turtles.
-Dodge Laser Obstacles and Containers.
-Slide in direction you want to move. (RIGHT, LEFT, JUMP, CRAWL).
-Controls wil be inverted when the ground changes color.
-Increase difficult and game speed over time and decrease by collecting turtles.
-For all the family and all the audiences.
-No additional costs and no purchases integrated in application.
-Instructions and movement controls in more than 7 languages.
-Choose your favourite hero runner from SIX characters.
-Play offline while you have Diamonds.(Lifes)
-New top Endless Runner Game in 2020.

I'm a Indie Game Developer and if you want to support my project don't doubt in download it, and share it with your friends on any social network. And you don't forget rate it with 5 stars. Thanks and Enjoy it.

J. Valeska Games
